title: New: Pretty, Handsome – Hands On
body:
Starting out as an FKA Twigs inspired, R&B slow jam, before blossoming into a far more upbeat, house driven number, **Pretty, Handsome’s** debut track _Hands On_, is a seductive first outing.

The duo, comprised of Stephen Ryan Tucker and Sierra Totten openly describe their influences as SOHN, Twigs, The Weeknd and Odessa, four artists that definitely appear to have direct influence on Hands On, yet it threatens to open out into a far more danceable electronic number. Check it out below.
